target_name: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity
computation_definitions:
Data unavailable (Type4)
There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
indicator_name: Change in water-use efficiency over time
indicator_definition: The change in water use efficiency, which is the change in the ratio of the value added to the volume of water use, over time, expressed in USD/㎥.
computation_calculations: 글로벌 정보 시스템(AQUASTAT)을 통해 각 국가별 책임기관으로부터 물과 농업에 관한 설문지 데이터 수집
global_indicator_name: Change in water-use efficiency over time
graph_title: 시간에 따른 물 이용 효율성 변화
title: Untitled
